resources.string: We are students attending UofM. Are interests in computer science varies and we teamed up to make the Magpie application a reality for Advanced Progamming II. We are mainly junior are junior and senior level students. Magpie is a mobile NFAT app which will capture SMTP packets.
Choose type of Packets to capture

How to run: Click launch icon. Click a Magpie to initiate the packet capture process. Click on other buttons to see contact us, about us, info on application, and the privacy policy. In the following view check box will appear getting options for what type of packets to capture. Also, were to send the final product ie email, cloud, pc. Click began to capture packets. In the run screen options to stop and exit.
